/* Degrees of gun legislation */ Homocide is not being discussed in this section, just gun legislation. This homocide in Switzerland point doesn't belong in this section.
homocide not an issue? that's news.

the point is to demonstrate compatibility of high gun ownership and low homocide

rules? the kellerman studies are discussed elsewhere on the page. The others are selected numbers presented in comaparison.

Edit to remove US-centric viewpoints. Wikipedia is an international encyclopedia.
clarified "fundamental right" passage to "American 2nd amend. right"
rv. "Fundamental right" is mostly US POV. Other changes are similarly tendentious
reversion of something that was definitely not "vandalism". I think an admin is needed to look into user Yaf
rv vandalism. Most gun control supporters do not believe there is a fundamental right or need for private individuals to own firearms.
/* Summary of Positions */ reduced groundless POV, eliminated non-gun-control "arguments"
/* Degrees of gun legislation */ rv. Gun control advocates's positions were only ones given. A balance is needed instead.
/* Specific locales */ added link to Gun politics in Mexico
Edited to be NPOV. Heading "Degrees of gun control" implies support for lessened gun rights.
actually to remove political bias, it's best to list both groups the way they self-identify
/* Balance of power */ added mention of germany
